General_Description: '''Blood, Sweat, and Tears''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]]n [[Spartan army|forces]] need support in the upcoming battle against [[Athens]]."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra aided Sparta in conquest battles against Athens throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Dining in Hell]] and [[Horrors of War]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
